name: Get Your Dye Off My Die!
name_original: Get Your Dye Off My Die!
description:
----- made in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam -----

Get Your Dye Off My Die! is a fast-reaction game, where you grumpily protect your beautiful black-and-white die from vandalists trying to paint it! Rotate your die to match the pattern of the oncoming projectiles, and absorb the colors inside the dots!

Roll the dice like you never had before, and survive as long as you can to get the highest score possible!

Credits and thanks:

* https://somepx.itch.io/ for the pixel art font

* https://brevynmusic.itch.io/ for the music

* https://freesound.org/ for (some of) the sound effects
